title: Gideon, Champion of Justice
text: +1: Put a loyalty counter on Gideon, Champion of Justice for each creature target opponent controls.0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Champion of Justice becomes a Human Soldier creature with power and toughness each equal to the number of loyalty counters on him and gains indestructible. He's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.−15: Exile all other permanents.
